strings.SCRAPYARD_EQUIP_ENERGYBAR_PICKUP: Gain a brief health regeneration boost, a brief speed boost, and begin recharing shields.
strings.SCRAPYARD_EQUIP_ENERGYBAR_DESC: Increase <style=cIsHealing>health regen</style> by <style=cIsHealing>{0}%</style> and <style=cIsUtility>movement speed</style> by <style=cIsUtility>{1}%</style> for <style=cIsUtility>{2}</style> seconds. Additionally begin recharging <style=cIsHealing>shield</style>.
strings.SCRAPYARD_EQUIP_MOONSHINE_PICKUP: Attacks have a chance to miss but every miss causes your attacks to explode.
strings.SCRAPYARD_EQUIP_MOONSHINE_DESC: <style=cIsDamage>{0}%</style> chance to miss but every miss causes your next attack to explode dealing <style=cIsDamage>{1}%</style> <style=cStack>(+{1}% per miss)</style> damage in a <style=cIsDamage>{2}m</style> radius <style=cStack>(+{2}m per miss)</style>.
